userInterface.defer_message: Your system will be upgraded to macOS Catalina automatically if you do not take action by the date above.Please open the Self-Service app (Applications>Self-Service) and complete the upgrade at a time that is convenient for you.
userInterface.paragraph1_text: You are required to upgrade to macOS Catalina.  The upgrade process will take up to 60 minutes BUT you will not be able to use your Mac during this time frame.If now is not a convenient time to start the upgrade, you can choose to defer and start the upgrade from the Self Service app (Applications>Self-Service) at a later time (for example during lunch or at the end of your work day).Please remember to save your work and make sure your Mac is plugged into power before starting the upgrade process.
userInterface.paragraph_title_text: A macOS update is required on your machine.
